page.title: 15THORNABY INDUSTRIAL ESTATE
page.content: Thornaby industrial estate covers an area of approximately 3 square km. and is built on land previously used for farming.There are 35 to 40 different factories which produce a wide variety of goods including high technology, electronic goods such as computers and other manufactured goods such as lamposts,floor coverings, games, kitchens, watches, and pet food etc. Some of the units provide services such as British telephone systems and car van hire.Some companies have been given loans or grants to help them to start up.They have chosen Thornaby for a number of reasons.One manager said it was nicer to be in the countryside, and also that it had easy access. There are a number of factories under construction but over 1/3 is still avalibale for constrution of new factories.
